## DynamicContext type

A Dynamic context is an array of Self Describing JSON contexts, or an array of callbacks which return Self Describing JSON contexts The array can be a mix of both contexts and callbacks which generate contexts

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type DynamicContext = Array<SelfDescribingJson | ((...params: any[]) => SelfDescribingJson | null)>;
```
